Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.rules

Interface RulesConvertible<T extends GameOperationState,​S extends Rules<T,​S>>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the GameOperationState required for the rules application
S - The type of the Rules that can be merged with this RulesConvertible
All Known Subinterfaces:
ApplicableBRules, ApplicableMRules, ApplicableRules<T,​S>, ExpandableBRules, ExpandableMRules, ExpandableRules<T,​S>
All Known Implementing Classes:
BRules, MRules, Rules
public interface RulesConvertible<T extends GameOperationState,​S extends Rules<T,​S>>
Brief Interface for Rules conversion

    • isComplete

      java.lang.Boolean isComplete()
      Brief Tells if this instance is rules complete
      Returns:
